DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate correlation clinical radiological outcome Stapled TransAnal Rectal Resection ( STARR )
DOC.brief_title: Stapled TransAnal Rectal Resection ( STARR ) : Clinical Radiological Outcome
DOC.criteria: > 18 year clinical sign ODS prior effective conservative treatment anterior rectocele and/or intussusception MRdefecography < 18 year fix enteroceles severe fecal incontinence external rectal prolapse anismus
